page.title: 05A DAY IN MUM'S LIFE
page.content: The alarm goes off at 7 am. I get dressed and have a wash. Then I go downstairs and make a cup of tea. I get the three children up at 8 am. They get dressed while I do breakfast. At 9 am I send two off to school. At 5 past 9 I take the youngest to school and then come back home and make beds. I do the dishes and fill up the washing machine. I dust and hoover, go down town to do the shopping then come home to put the washing out. At 12 o'clock the two youngest come home for dinner. I cook them something to eat. I send them to school at 1 pm. I wash up the dinner dishes and go to visit a friend for a chat and a cup of tea. I meet the children at school at 3.30 pm. I then bring in the washing and iron it, do the tea and wash up the dishes.
